com.interpss.simu.multicase.rule
Interface RuleBase

All Superinterfaces:
EMFPersistable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
RuleBaseImpl
public interface RuleBase
extends EMFPersistable

A representation of the model object 'Rule Base'. Class for defining Rule base. RuleBase --(*) RuleSet --(*) Rule. A RuleBase is intended for a type of violation type, decribed by the violation type field.

The following features are supported:

  • Violate Type
  • VUpper Limit PU
  • VLower Limit PU
  • Apply Rule Base
  • Rule Sets

See Also:
MCaseRulePackage.getRuleBase()

apply

java.util.List<java.lang.Object> apply(LoadflowAlgorithm algo,
                                       IPSSMsgHub msg)
                                       throws InterpssException
Apply this rule base to the AclfNet object contained by the algo object. Then run Loadflow using the algo object. It returns a list of msg, describing rule applying details.

Throws:
InterpssException

applyForPriority

boolean applyForPriority(Network net,
                         int priority,
                         IPSSMsgHub msg)
                         throws InterpssException
Apply rule sets in the rule base with the specified priority. It returns true if there are rules fired.

Throws:
InterpssException
